data.message: Patiently waiting for the release of my year.. you guys are great with these types of things they truly give back to us... i enjoy it thanks facebook.

replies.message: We hope you enjoy it, Tasha! Thanks for the great feedback. -Sarah
Thanks again to Facebook for all their efforts and especially for this gift.  Its so nice to look back and share our year with friends and family :-)  Seasons greeting to all at Facebook :-)

Facebook, if you need so much money, why then you don't add opition
'Change name page for money' I'm sure you look for this suggest for everyone. and get more of your $$
You're very welcome, Claire. Thanks for your kind words and Happy Holidays to you! -Hailey
